Title: Next Generation Firewall for Improving Security in Company and IoT Network
Source title: Proceedings - 2019 International Seminar on Intelligent Technology and Its Application, ISITIA 2019
Affiliations: Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, BINUS Graduate Program, Computer Science, Jakarta, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Soewito, B., Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, BINUS Graduate Program, Computer Science, Jakarta, Indonesia; Andhika, C.E., Bina Nusantara University, Computer Science Department, BINUS Graduate Program, Computer Science, Jakarta, Indonesia
Abstract: The goal of this research is to analyze of effectiveness the Next Generation Firewall that implemented to secure IoT in smart house and company network. The method used in this research is the method of comparison with a test of DDoS attacks, phishing and SQL Injection on both network, smart house network and company network. From the results of experiment, it can be concluded that the Next Generation Firewall has significantly better performance for protecting smart house and company network, it can increase security of data communication networks against threats from the Internet. © 2019 IEEE.
Author Keywords: DDOS attack; IoT; next generation firewall; smart home; SQL injection
Index Keywords: Automation; Computer system firewalls; Denial-of-service attack; Houses; Internet of things; Next generation networks; Company network; Data communication networks; DDoS Attack; IOT networks; next generation firewall; Phishing; Smart homes; SQL injection; Network security
